ComicInfo.Title: The Discount King; Klotch; Cracked Gives You the News-Makers; The Advantage of One-Man Elections; Ask a Silly Question, Get a...; Cracked Looks at a Dog Show; Hawk; Escape Using Books; Take the Cracked Current Events Test; Cracked's Guide to Bicycling; A Day at the Airport; ZZZZPG
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Unlike those other super heroes, Super Hawk is determined to win the Vietnam War on behalf of President Nixon! Unfortunately his one weakness is Agent Orange.
Hudd and Dini use a stack of books to reach the top of the prison wall but the guard has been reading a book on preventing escapes.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:43:48. [Issue ID 250466]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,John Severin,Vic Martin,Don Orehek,Bob Taylor,Bernard Baily
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,John Severin,Vic Martin,Don Orehek,Bob Taylor,Bernard Baily
